"Eddic": "Before, I had you form a party, right? Well now it'll be the other way around: Join one!"
"If you see anyone lookin' for folks to join them, take 'em up on their offer!"
"Just be like \"Yeah, let's fight together!\" or whatever."
"Then you just go defeat some enemies. Simple stuff, ain't it?"
"Don't be shy about it. Be sure to take chances like that and live a little!"
